solution_line_template: She has {marbles_after_loss} marbles after this because {initial_marbles} - {marbles_lost} = <<{initial_marbles}-{marbles_lost}={marbles_after_loss}>>{marbles_after_loss}
Her friend gives her {marbles_from_friend} marbles because {marbles_after_loss} x {friend_multiplier} = <<{marbles_after_loss}*{friend_multiplier}={marbles_from_friend}>>{marbles_from_friend}

Adding those marbles to the {marbles_after_loss} she had before, she ends up with {marbles_from_friend} marbles + {marbles_after_loss} marbles = <<{marbles_from_friend}+{marbles_after_loss}={final_marbles}>>{final_marbles} marbles
